Description: This file sets the specific parameters of the institute Liten.
The field 'ROOT_PATH' sets the default working folder for BiblioMeter application.
The field 'COL_NAMES_DPT' sets the dict of the column names for each departement.
The field 'DPT_LABEL_DICT' sets the dict of the list of possible labels in the employees database for each departement.
The field 'DPT_OTP_DICT' sets the dict of the list of OTPs for each department.
The field 'INST_FILTER_LIST' sets the list of intitutions used for filtering the list of publications by institutions.
The field 'INSTITUTE_INST_LIST' sets the list of intitutions used for identifying authors of the Institute.
The field 'INST_IF_STATUS' sets the status for using the file of IFs of journals:
- true : use of the IFS of the Institute publications;
- false: use of the full IFs database.
